page.title: 03Radiation Dynamics Limited.
page.content:
One of the factories on the Groundwell Industrial Estate is Radiation Dynamics Limited.
Radiation Dynamics was founded back in 1971 by the Radiation Dynamics Inc. in New York.It is a very small company compared to the one in New York. Radiation Dynamics are building highly technical radiographic linear accelerators.They have been spread all over the world for medical and industrial reasearch. An electron beam service centre was opened in 1977 by the installation of a 15Mev 75kw Dynamitron Accelerator at the Swindon site.
